chapter.title: Authors
chapter.para: The GSQL project was founded by Taras Halturin. Please visit this online list to know all GSQL contributors.

For more information on GSQL, please visit the project website at http://gsql.org. Bug reports should be made using the Bug Tracker at the project development site
http://code.google.com/p/gsql/issues/list
This manual was written by Taras Halturin. Please send all comments and suggestions regarding this manual to GSQL Devel list http://groups.google.com/group/gsql-dev.
